required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Safety Study of LY2886721 Single Doses in Healthy Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: Single-Ascending Dose, Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetic, and Pharmacodynamic Study of LY2886721 in Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: This is a Phase 1 study in healthy subjects to evaluate the safety and tolerability of LY2886721 single doses, how the body handles the drug, and the drug's effect on the body.

detailed_description.textblock: This is a Phase 1 study with 2 parts, both in healthy subjects. Part 1 is a subject- and investigator-blind, placebo-controlled, randomized, 3-period, crossover study. Part 1 will assess the safety and tolerability of LY2886721 single doses, how the body handles the drug, and the drug's effect on the body. Part 2 is a subject- and investigator-blind, placebo-controlled, randomized study to assess the safety and tolerability of an LY2886721 single dose, how the body handles the drug, and the drug's effect on the body including in cerebrospinal fluid.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with Clinically Significant Effects
primary_outcome.time_frame: Predose to 10-14 days after final dose of study drug

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose and up to Day 8 of each period
Predose and up to Day 8 of each period
Predose and up to Day 8 of each period

secondary_outcome.measure: Cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) concentration of LY2886721 (Cmax) (Part 2 only)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose and up to 36 hours postdose

secondary_outcome.measure: Cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) Pharmacodynamic biomarker Abeta 1-40 concentration (Part 2 only)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose and up to 36 hours postdose

secondary_outcome.measure: Cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) concentration of LY2886721 (AUC) (Part 2 only)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose and up to 36 hours postdose

arm_group.description: Up to 3 single doses will be administered over 3 periods (each period is 8 days) in a crossover fashion either LY:LY:LY or LY:LY:Placebo in random order with variable doses ranging from 1 mg up to 200 mg
Single dose in up to 1 period (the period is 8 days)
Single dose of LY2886721, dose determined by Part 1
Single dose of LY2886721, dose determined by Part 1

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy men and nonchild-bearing potential women
- 20 years or older
- Body mass index between 18-32 kg/m2
Exclusion Criteria:
- Taking over-the-counter or prescription medication with the exception of vitamins or minerals or stable doses of thyroid or estrogen hormone replacement
- Smoke more than 10 cigarettes per day
